# VZStorageDevice

**Class**

A class that represents a storage device in a VM.

## Declaration

```swift
class VZStorageDevice
```

## Overview

Don’t create a `VZStorageDevice` directly. Use one of its subclasses, such as [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZUSBMassStorageDevice], instead.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Inherited By

- VZUSBMassStorageDevice

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
title: VZStorageDevice
